mapper.select: SELECT mem_id AS memID, mem_name AS memName, mem_num AS memNum, mem_buseo AS memBuseoCode, mem_grade AS memGradeCode, mem_level AS memLevel, mem_confirm AS memConfirm, buseo_name AS memBuseoName, grade_name AS memGradeName FROM member LEFT JOIN member_buseo ON mem_buseo = buseo_id LEFT JOIN member_grade ON mem_grade = grade_id WHERE mem_id = #{memID} AND mem_pwd = #{memPwd}

SELECT mem_name AS memName, mem_buseo AS memBuseoCode, B.buseo_name AS memBuseoName, mem_grade AS memGradeCode, G.grade_name AS memGradeName, mem_num AS memNum, mem_entdate AS memEntdate FROM member M, member_buseo B, member_grade G WHERE M.mem_buseo = B.buseo_id AND M.mem_grade = G.grade_id AND mem_num = #{sessionNum}
